title: Object Storage
description1: You have not created an Object Storage service yet.
description2: Get unlimited storage on demand, accessible via the API.
description3: Object Storage involves placing your data in an unlimited space, accessible directly via an HTTP API. You can integrate access to this data from your applications, using the range of existing OpenStack Swift libraries. Object Storage offers access rights administration, along with intelligent storage features such as version and expiry date management, and syncing between different locations.
description4: Your data is secured through triple-replication to guarantee its life expectancy, and you get usage-based billing from the first GB used.
cardLeftTitle: Placing an Object Storage container behind a domain name
cardLeftDesc: Find out how to configure your object container with your domain
cardMiddleDescription: Find out how to enable automatic deletion of objects from your container
cardRightTitle: Share an object via a temporary URL
cardRightDesc: Find out how to share an object via a temporary URL
